locations.name: Robarts 1F - Entrance
locations.brief_description: The entrance to the Robarts library.
locations.long_description: The entrance to the Robarts library. It's a weekday, so you're not surprised to see a lot of other students around at this time. You keep your head down because you have social anxiety. Thankfully, despite the events of today, you've never lost your Tcard.

locations.name: Robarts 2F - Study Area
locations.brief_description: The study area in the Robarts library.
locations.long_description: This is your favourite study spot. The windows keep the place well-lit and slightly less depressing. There's a lot of Starbucks cups and a few energy drink cans scattered around. You like it here, but so does everyone else. Sometimes it's hard to find an empty seat.

locations.name: Robarts 2F - Dining Area
locations.brief_description: The dining area in the Robarts library.
locations.long_description: One of the many dining halls avaliable to students. Students like to eat here in between lectures and long studying hours. The Starbucks always has a long line. You don't really want to be reminded of how many caffeinated drinks you've bought here.

items.name: Laptop Charger
items.description: A charger that charges your laptop.

items.name: USB Drive
items.description: A really important flash drive that contains you and your partner's project.

items.name: Phone
items.description: Your phone that you can't go anywhere without.
